message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair play!
Let's be practical, Alice. Time is money, and it's losing value fast. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it while it's still a good deal!
I understand your desire for a larger share, Bob, but I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split. It's still a good deal, considering the inflation. Let's settle this before it's too late!

Alice, we're running out of time. I'm offering a compromise at 58/42. It's more than my last offer, and it gives you a decent share before inflation eats away at the value any further. Let's close this deal.
